abstract: As wireless providers rush to grow through acquisitions, they may end up hurting themselves — and consumers.
snippet: As wireless providers rush to grow through acquisitions, they may end up hurting themselves — and consumers.
lead_paragraph: If you are wondering who will be your cellphone provider next year, so are the cellphone companies. Maneuvers by American cellphone providers to acquire one another are threatening to erupt into all-out war. And the question is not only which ones will survive, but whether the survivors will be ruined by the prey they are rushing to swallow, leaving consumers by the wayside.

headline.main: Few Winners in Heated Cellphone Wars
headline.print_headline: Heated Cellphone Wars Are Producing Few Winners
